name: Stacey Bradshaw
introduction: Stacey Bradshaw launched her career in 2012 with the leading role in Touched by Grace, co-starring Ben Davies. This has been followed by many leading and supporting roles in inspirational and faith-based movies, including the deeply moving film Unplanned, the true story of Abby Johnson.Stacey has had a passion for acting since she was a young girl. She started performing in theater productions when she was 16 years old and went on to get a Theatre degree at Bryan College. Now she is fulfilling a lifelong dream of acting in films and has received 4 best acting awards in addition to other nominations. Between acting jobs, she loves doing behind-the-scenes photography for films.Some of Stacey's favorite hobbies include singing, reading mystery books, ballroom and swing dancing, watching classic films, and spending time with her family and friends.- IMDb Mini Biography By: Stacey Bradshaw
